Mission 01: New Land.description: You have found the passage through the mountains and can report Ongulf about your success.

Paw and Fur: Ranger.description: You are Ranger of the Paw and Fur hunting elite. You currently have 26 Paw and Fur points.

Paw and Fur: Hide.description: Try find its hideout and kill it.

Paw and Fur: The Snapper.description: Grizzly told you about the Snapper, a crocodile that already killed many citizens of Port Hope. Try find its hideout and kill it.

Paw and Fur: Shardhead.description: Try find its hideout and kill it.
